title.rendered: Ecommerce Europe – Successful Selling on European Ecommerce Marketplace with Luke Havard of Dwarfs.io

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 44:39 — 40.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 44:39 — 40.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Luke Harvard from dwarfs.io. Dwarfs.io is a small fund based in Holland, they acquire e-commerce businesses, and they specialize in non-Amazon marketplaces and Europe. Learn how to be successful at selling in the European Ecommerce space.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • How things work differently in UK/Europe compared to the USA
  • How to have multiple channel streams
  • To recognize the missed opportunities and expand into other countries or markets
  • How to focus not only on what works now but also looking at future risks
  • How to work with business owners in Europe
